short_summary: This is the first phase of a two-phase process. The first phase will evaluate the qualification of all interested suppliers. The second phase will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.
description: Environment and  Climate  Change  Canada  (ECCC)  requires  services  for  the  transformer’s switchgear end of life replacement project located at 867 Lakeshore Road, Burlington, ON, L7S 1A1.
